section.name: The Train Story
section.p: Most of the code and documentation for this project was written on my daily trainrides to and from work. I needed some training to be able to switch contexts so quickly. At the beginning I have not really got my thoughts into the project before I had to switch trains. After some time I got used to it and now I just sit down and start developing. But maybe if you find a bug that was because I sat beside a beatyful girl in the train ;)
